Text: Find the Perfect Gift for Dad and Free Delivery for YouEddie Bauer Celebrate Fathers Day June th Remember Dad and get Free Standard Delivery when you spend or more Hi Scott Its always a challenge to find the perfect gift for Fathers Day but weve come up with a few great ideas to help you out Heres your chance to update his wardrobe with some stylish new clothes how long has it been spruce up his office or give him that hammock hes been eyeing for years Shop for Dad Keep in mind our standard delivery deadline is June th Plus Enter for a chance to win a SONY HTD DVD HOME THEATRE PACKAGE one of three SONY DIGITAL MAVICA MVCFD cameras or one of five SONY CLI PEGS handhelds But remember this event ends on June th If youd rather not receive Eddie Bauer Email please reply to this message and insert the word unsubscribe in the subject line Or use the link below muedbeaspeshendriectenroncom You signed up for Eddie Bauer Email with this address
